title: Agadir Argan Oil Volumizing Styling Mousse, 8.5 Ounce
description: Moisturizes, conditions, smoothest, humidity resistant. No build up and gives super shine to dry, damaged, stressed hair. Protects hair against chemicals and hot tools. Great aroma that will waken your senses. Paraben free. 24 hour, lasting shine.

title: Suave Professionals 4 Piece Moroccan Infusion Shine Gift Set
description: The new Moroccan infusion line from Suave professionals is infused with authentic Moroccan argan oil, a lightweight miracle oil that absorbs instantly and is known to give brilliant shine and long lasting conditioning benefits. Contains Moroccan shine shampoo, Moroccan shine conditioner, (8 ounce) Moroccan deep conditioning mask, (3 ounce) Moroccan shine oil. Comes in a convenient gift box.
